title: Discovery QRD-028: dimensional_fusion
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) exhibits novel properties under dimensional_fusion transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: An innovative implementable distributed system fusing dimensions in Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_dimensional_fusion(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference))
